name: Shopping and Stay Safe
description:
A little game I made for the Stay Safe! Game Jam. Hope you guys and girls enjoy it, and also stay safe at home.

You need to go shopping for one last time before lockdown, and to protect yourself and others, it's advised by WHO to stay at least 1 meter away from others .

The game is very short and relax (kind of), though it's the best I could make right now within 48h. Hope you have a good time with it.
